record.field: The resource "%(work)s" doesn't have any timesheet work. You won't be able to register the worked hours. Do you wish to continue?
If you don't assign a Task to this activity or the Task does not have a Time Sheet Work, all work time registered on the timesheet line %(timesheet)s will be lost. Are you sure?
Deleting the activity/ies %(activity)s will unregister all the work time for these. Do you wish to continue?
Setting the activity %(activity)s with no duration will result in losing these timesheet lines: %(timesheet)s. Do you wish to proceed?
Changing the work of the timesheet line %(timesheet)s will change the activity %(activity)s. Do you wish to proceed?
